description: Some Windows Server 2016 systems are experiencing issues where the update referenced in KB-5036899 installs successfully on some servers but fails on others, despite having sufficient disk space. This inconsistency can lead to fragmented systems where critical updates are not applied uniformly. As a result, it could create security and operational risks across the server environment, especially if the update addresses vulnerabilities or critical functionality. Administrators should investigate the specific conditions under which this update fails to install and apply potential workarounds or solutions to ensure consistent patch compliance. Monitoring logs for errors related to this update can yield insights into the underlying issue.
